snippet: The four-door Spark, made in South Korea and sold in the United States since last year, starts at $12,170 and gets about 35 miles to the gallon.
abstract: Chevrolet's inexpensive mini Spark car is unlikely hit as many American buyers warm to car, even though automaker that has traditionally struggled to sell small vehicles; four-door Spark, made in South Korea, starts at $12,170 and get about 35 miles per gallon.
lead_paragraph: The four-door Spark, made in South Korea and sold in the United States since last year, starts at $12,170 and gets about 35 miles to the gallon.

headline.main: Chevrolet’s Cheap Minicar, the Spark, Is a Surprisingly Strong Seller
headline.print_headline: Chevrolet’s Cheap Minicar, the Spark, Is a Surprisingly Strong Seller
